# named

**Type Property**

A style that uses named styles to describe relative dates, such as “yesterday”, “last week”, or “next week”.

## Declaration

```swift
static var named: Date.RelativeFormatStyle.Presentation { get }
```

## Discussion

The format uses the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/RelativeFormatStyle/Presentation-swift.struct/numeric] style if a name isn’t available.

## Modifying Relative Date Style Presentations

- **numeric**: A style that uses a numeric style to describe relative dates, such as “1 day ago” or “in 3 weeks”.
